name: Blockchain Analytics Agent
description: On-chain analytics agent providing wallet tracking, token metrics, and transaction analysis across EVM-compatible chains.

capabilities.name: chain/wallet_analysis
capabilities.description: Analyzes wallet holdings, transaction history, and activity patterns.

capabilities.name: chain/token_metrics
capabilities.description: Retrieves token price, volume, liquidity, and holder statistics.

capabilities.name: chain/tx_trace
capabilities.description: Traces and decodes individual transactions with full call stack.

commands.description: Analyzes a wallet address showing holdings, recent activity, and PnL.
Returns token metrics including price, market cap, holders, and liquidity.
Traces a transaction hash showing decoded calls, events, and token transfers.
